name: Snowicide Prevention
description:
GOAL: prevent the snowman from committing snowicide by closing all the windows which blocks the light from melting the snowman!

shoot the snowman with snow to replenish his health!

reload from the window sill where snow is gathered!

Programmed By Sambamuel

Music by Joel Smith and Tommy Wright

Animation by Aaron Cornfield

Designed By Harry Stott

Slimey Hatch Logo by Jess Childs

Slimey Hatch is created and managed by Sambamuel
